body:
After a `git pull`, Spack tells me

```
$ spack install bliss %gcc@4.9.3
==> Error: Expected database version 0.9.1 but found version 0.9.2
```

I have no idea where this error comes from or how to remedy it. Spack should output more context; e.g. a file or directory name would already make a world of difference, or the name of the database software/package that produces this error, etc.
title: Improve the error message when the database version is not what is expected
